snippet: Stocks were slightly higher as a partial shutdown of the federal government went into a fourth day on Friday, but the major indexes lost overall this week.
abstract: Stocks post modest gains, driven by budding optimism among traders that Washington's politicians can soon reach agreement on budget and on increasing government's borrowing limit.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were slightly higher as a partial shutdown of the federal government went into a fourth day on Friday, but the major indexes lost overall this week.

headline.main: Wall Street Edges Higher, Shutdown Still a Concern
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Edges Higher, Shutdown Still a Concern
